Package org.omnaest.utils.spring.scope

Interface Summary
BeanScopeThreadContextManager A BeanScopeThreadContextManager allows to add and remove Threads to or from a spring bean Scope.
LocaleBeanScope.LocaleAware If a spring bean is declared under the LocaleBeanScope it can implements this interface to get the Locale injected after creating the bean instance.
LocaleBeanScope.LocaleResolver Resolver for a Locale
TrailingBeanIdentifierPatternBeanScope.ScopedBeanCreationPostProcessor Allows to post process newly created or from ApplicationContext resolved beans.
TrailingBeanIdentifierPatternBeanScope.TrailingPatternResolver  
 

Class Summary
BeanScopeAwareCallableDecorator<V> The BeanScopeAwareCallableDecorator does call the BeanScopeThreadContextManager.addCurrentThreadToBeanScope() and BeanScopeThreadContextManager.removeCurrentThreadFromBeanScope() at the appropriate times
BeanScopeAwareRunnableDecorator The BeanScopeAwareCallableDecorator does call the BeanScopeThreadContextManager.addCurrentThreadToBeanScope() and BeanScopeThreadContextManager.removeCurrentThreadFromBeanScope() at the appropriate times
LocaleBeanScope A bean Scope using Locales as separation aspect.
TrailingBeanIdentifierPatternBeanScope A special CustomScopeConfigurer to allow
TrailingBeanIdentifierPatternBeanScope.TrailingPatternBySessionAttributeResolver Resolves the trailing pattern by a given HttpSession attributes value
